name: What Fire
description:
You have a special amulet that your grandmother gave you. Until now, you did not know that it could protect you from curses.

A fire demon-elephant has invaded your home and put a curse on your family. You are the only one who can see the fires and chaos it is creating. Put out the fires, give candy to your family, and try to survive!

Created for the Hangover Game Jam. Theme: Elephant in the Room.
